rules.Title: The Rules of AIMUS
rules.Description: Find answers to your questions here

general_rules.title: General Rules
general_rules.description: By connecting to our servers or visiting the official project website, you automatically agree to the following rules and are obligated to comply with them.

section_1.title: Cheats and configurations
section_1.1.1: It is prohibited to use or store any cheats, configurations, installers, skinchangers, AHK scripts, and other programs that give you advantage.
section_1.1.1_addition: * If you have installed cheats or configurations that are intended for CS:GO, but do not work in CS2, you will not be banned. However, the last modification date of the file must be no later than 09/26/2023.
section_1.1.2: The administrator has the right to request an inspection if there is a suspicion of cheating. The player must comply with this request.
section_1.1.2_punishment: [Refusal of verification: 1st time - 30-day ban. 2nd time - permanent ban.]
section_1.1.3: Arguing and conflicting with the administrator without evidence is prohibited. Complaints are accepted at the following address: t.me/aimus_administration
section_1.1.4: It is forbidden to discuss the personal lives of moderators and administrators.
section_1.1.5: If a player's Steam account is banned for cheating on FACEIT or detected by Ban Patrol, they will be automatically banned from the server.

section_2.title: Voice and text chat
section_2.2.1: Profanity, shouting, provocations, toxicity, playing music through the microphone, flaming, retaliating, and similar behavior are prohibited.
section_2.2.3: Insults towards family members are strictly prohibited.
section_2.2.4: Inciting ethnic conflicts and political discussions are prohibited.
section_2.2.6: Flood — sending more than 5 messages in 10 seconds.
section_2.2.7: Unauthorized Discord/Telegram/site/server advertising is prohibited (only: aimus.uz, t.me/aimus_chat, discord.gg/aimus are allowed)
section_2.2.8: Monitoring of other players after death is prohibited.
section_2.2.9: Impersonating an admin (unless you are an admin) is prohibited.
section_2.2.10: Insulting the AIMUS project is strictly prohibited.
section_2.2.11: It is forbidden to use the report function to bypass the gag or troll the administrator.
section_2.2.12: The use of voice-changing programs is prohibited.

section_3.title: Game process
section_3.3.1: The use of bugs, exploits, and holes on the map is prohibited.
section_3.3.2: It is prohibited to play through another account after the main account is blocked.
section_3.3.3: Unreasonable voting (!vk, !vb, !vm) against new players is prohibited.

section_4.title: Player names (nicknames)
section_4.4.1: Rude nicknames and tags are prohibited. Admin warns, if the nickname is not changed within 5 minutes - a penalty will be imposed.
section_4.4.2: Nicknames in advertising content are prohibited.
section_4.4.3: Fake tags such as: Admin, Moderator, Creator, etc. are prohibited.
section_4.4.4: Nicknames must contain only Latin or Cyrillic letters (A-Z, А-Я), numbers from 0–12 are allowed.
